Summary: Overcast when first seen very bright and could only see one thing.
divs: Sighting Detailsdriving home from work and was suspicious of how bright this thing was in the sky and saw that it was still tried to take a pics with phone(new)and did not save pics my error. went home and ate dinner and my wife thinks that is am crazy now but left with a camera sony cyber shot 7.2mp and 4xs zoom and zommed in. the object seemed farther a way than earlier (video camera dead has better zoom). then i saw too objects, that did not look like stars to me and had no beacon lights. like what i saw years a go that i just came out about to you guys. it was cold and windy.
